resources.string: No Internet Connection. Please check connectivity and try again.

All as we know SELFIE WITH DAUGHTER a world wide revolution after promoted by Hon’ble Prime Minister of India Sh. Narender Modi. 

In this campaigning named as Selfie With Daughter is a concept in which parents take a selfie with their daughter and feel to be proud parent of a girl child, and this proud feeling thought motivates our society specially those parents who give preference for male baby. Selfie With Daughter concept will encourage to human society for girl. 

Beginning of this concept from a small village named ‘Bibipur’ Distt. Jind (Haryana)- INDIA. I try to take help facebook/Whatsapp to complete this campaigning. We start this June 9, 2015 and got 794 selfies in 10 days campaigning and distribute cash reward as ` 3100/- with trophy & appreciation certificate for first best selfie ` 2100/- for second, ` 1100/- for third best selfies.
On June 28, 2015 PM Sh. Narender Modi shared this campaigning by “Mann ki Baat” Program broadcast by “All India Radio”
